detailsOfAchievement: started with a mission of rehabilitation of the rural unreached all type of disabled except leprosy of kapadwanj kathlal thasra balasinor and virpur of kheda district and vision to provide support guidance and enthuse them shri vadilal s gandhi charitable trust working adopting the unique method inclusive education of the disabled at secondary stage smt maniben gandhi day care centre for mentally retarded children in this centre 25 children upto 18 having mental retardation attend this centre daily children are provided transport services for to and fro journey from their homes to the centre a physiotherapy centre named smt shantaben chimanlal patel physiotherapy center also run by the trust and the centre is well equipped with all latest instruments and a skilled physiotherapist a cerebral palsy center named smt shantaben a patel and shri ambalal r patel cp centre also run by the trust and the same is providing therapeutic services like physiotherapy psychotherapy and psychiatric intervention to the cp children of kapadwanj taluka around 20 children daily coming to the centre qualified physiotherapist and special educator provide regular therapy to the children and in addition psychological assessment camps are also organized for the treatment and assessment of the children to identify their mental and chronological age by expert psychologists every third tuesday of the month a cataract camp is also organized in the campus an expert team from sankara eye hospital mogar district anand provides free checkup for the cataract patients and the patients who are advised to get their cataract operated are sent to sankara eye hospital all medication operation performed free of cost with to and fro free transportation provision a balmandir named sharda balmandir also run by the trust especially for under privileged children camp for assessment of mentally ill patients are also organized every month where expert team of doctors consisting of psychologist and psychiatrist identifies mental illness in the patients and do provide them free medication summer camp for the special children is also organized by the trust to bring out the abilities of the disabled children via different activities the trust also run vocational training centre for sewing and embroidery the trust also organizes camps for distributing aid and appliances at regular intervals project for reproductive child health also have been taken by the trust special achievements board examination under inclusive education scheme 30 40 students in ssc and hsc board exams and the passing percentage is 90 percentages also they scores 80 90 percentage in the exams special olympic for mentally ill and cp and khel mahakumbh for the divyang are organized by the state government every year and our centre children participates in that and matter of pride is they have won gold silver and bronze medals with certificates and cash prize in the competition

Today we are having our own building with 433 students under our nurture and care. Transpiring the mission and vision of the founders, the school stands compatible with the best of the institutions in Gujarat. detailsOfAchievement: Surachana Education and Charitable Trust is a registered trust. Registration no. is E/5819/surat date: 20/09/2004. It is registered under Bombay Public Trust Act 1950 (29) Having the mission of upbringing life of people through different activities Surachana Education and Charitable Trust has been working restlessly for last 6 years.Team members of Surachana Education and Charitable trust had been working 10 flood affected villages of Surat District in collaboration with â€œCitizenâ€™s Initiative suratâ€. Apart from flood affected villages the organization has carried out Mid term and Final Evaluation of six Watershed Projects in state of Gujarat. The organizations is also extending supporting hand to the needy and poor people by providing assistance for treatment of their health problems by organizing medical camps in villages and carry out different welfare activities to help the poor, widows and needy people. To continue their study and boost up their motivational level, the Surachana Trust provides scholarships, free text books and other educational assistance to the poor and economical backward students especially Primary school children. Surachana Trust is very much involved in carrying out three Livelihood Awareness Programmes in villages of Surat and Dang district with collaboration of Khadi and Village industries Corporation of India â€“New Delhi. Surachana Trust has organized several Leadership Programs for youth, training for Women Empowerment and training on CBO formation. The organisation has organized Essay Competitions, Drawing Competitions and Elocution Competitions for the Primary School children. During the natural calamities Surachana Trust plays vital role in dissemination of useful and relevant information to the communities and carries out IEC activities in affected areas.

detailsOfAchievement: Bhungroo is World Bank innovation awardee. It is now part of NRLM of GoI. It is also got awarded as the best innovative program across the globe. SGIF is the only organization in India which has brought prestigious Buckminster Fuller award for socially responsible innovation in technology and design to India for the first time. Our farmers from TN were at the verge of committing suicides- within 1 year they have come out of abject poverty and now doubled their agriculture income.

sourceOfFunds.purpose: SGIF does not have any foreign funding. But in 2015-16, Dilasha NGO has sanctioned Rs.650000 . In this year, Rupees 325000 was release. The purpose of funding is a piloting BHUNGROO , a rain water harvesting system in the arid region of Aurangabad. The problem was no water and all bore well gets depleted. Bhungroo stored nearly five lakh litres water into the ground and guaranteed three crops in the year.
SGIF does not have any foreign funding. But in 2016-17, Dilasha NGO has released nearly Rs. 356000.

SGIF does not have any foreign grants sanctioned. In 2017-18, Firmenich has sanctioned Rs.20,00000 under CSR project. SGIF has constructed two units in the Tamilnadu state.The project was successfully completed. In this year, the Shubhamkaroti, Ashram has also sanctioned Rs.250000 for the Installation of unit in Ashram.
